Package atu_system.atu_app

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AlertController
    When error occurs due to invalid input from user, the Alertcontroller class shows alert window with message about the error.
    App
    App is the root class for the JavaFX application.
    ATUEngine
    Singleton.
    InputScreenController
    The InputScreenController class control on action event of input screen elements, including buttons directed to upload file window, table of students' data, table of statistics and generating team.
    OutputScreenController
    The OutputScreenController class control on action event of output screen elements, including the chart a button directed to the website for team results inquiry.
    Statistics
    Statistics is the class for creating statistic entries of students' data.
